member.name: T:Appleseed.Content.Web.ModulesEvents
member.summary: Event list

member.name: M:Appleseed.Content.Web.ModulesEvents.Page_Load(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: The Page_Load event handler on this User Control is used to obtain a DataReader of event information from the Events table, and then databind the results to a templated DataList server control. It uses the Appleseed.EventDB() data component to encapsulate all data functionality.

member.name: M:Appleseed.Content.Web.ModulesEvents.#ctor
member.summary: Public constructor. Sets base settings for module.

member.name: M:Appleseed.Content.Web.ModulesEvents.PreviousMonth_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: PreviousMonth_Click is fired when previous is clicked this function goes back one month by passing in -1 (add -1 month) to calendar

member.name: M:Appleseed.Content.Web.ModulesEvents.ChangeMonth(System.Int32)
member.summary: Main routine to handle changing the month to display relative to current display month and render it
member.param: number of months to add (positive or negative allowed)

member.name: M:Appleseed.Content.Web.ModulesEvents.NextMonth_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: NextMonth_Click fired when next month link is clicked Addes 1 month to current month by calling ChangeMonth

member.name: M:Appleseed.Content.Web.ModulesEvents.DisplayTime(System.Boolean,System.Object)
member.summary: Wrapper to call Devsolution.Portal dll If all day should not return anything if time passed and not allday should display in HH:MM AM or HH:MM PM format

member.name: M:Appleseed.Content.Web.ModulesEvents.RenderEvents(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: devsolution 2003/6/17: Change to make a RenderEvents for modularity Routine to add show calendar logic And Clean up code as now the calendar next and previous controls must re-render the display and get the data again e.g. modularize the code

member.summary: Searchable module implementation
member.param: ID of the user is searching
The fields where perfoming the search
member.returns: The SELECT sql to perform a search on the current module

member.summary: Searchable module

member.name: T:Appleseed.Content.Web.ModulesEventsDB
member.summary: Class that encapsulates all data logic necessary to add/query/delete events within the Portal database.

member.name: M:Appleseed.Content.Web.ModulesEventsDB.GetEvents(System.Int32,Appleseed.Framework.Site.Configuration.Appleseed.Framework.WorkFlowVersion)
member.summary:
The GetEvents method returns a DataSet containing all of the events for a specific portal module from the events database.
NOTE: A DataSet is returned from this method to allow this method to support both desktop and mobile Web UI.

member.name: M:Appleseed.Content.Web.ModulesEventsDB.GetSingleEvent(System.Int32,Appleseed.Framework.Site.Configuration.Appleseed.Framework.WorkFlowVersion)
member.summary: The GetSingleEvent method returns a SqlDataReader containing details about a specific event from the events database.

member.name: M:Appleseed.Content.Web.ModulesEventsDB.DeleteEvent(System.Int32)
member.summary: The DeleteEvent method deletes a specified event from the events database.

member.name: M:Appleseed.Content.Web.ModulesEventsDB.AddEvent(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.String,System.String,System.DateTime,System.String,System.String,System.Boolean,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: The AddEvent method adds a new event within the Events database table, and returns the ItemID value as a result.

member.name: M:Appleseed.Content.Web.ModulesEventsDB.UpdateEvent(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.String,System.String,System.DateTime,System.String,System.String,System.Boolean,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: The UpdateEvent method updates the specified event within the Events database table.

member.name: T:Appleseed.Content.Web.ModulesEventsEdit
member.summary: Edit events

member.name: M:Appleseed.Content.Web.ModulesEventsEdit.Page_Load(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: The Page_Load event on this Page is used to obtain the ModuleID and ItemID of the event to edit. It then uses the Appleseed.EventsDB() data component to populate the page's edit controls with the event details.

member.name: M:Appleseed.Content.Web.ModulesEventsEdit.AllDay_SelectedIndexChanged(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: DevSolution 2003/6/17 AllDay_SelectedIndexChanged fired when AllDay or Specific Time selected so that the appropriate combo boxes can be disabled for useability

member.name: M:Appleseed.Content.Web.ModulesEventsEdit.OnUpdate(System.EventArgs)
member.summary: The UpdateBtn_Click event handler on this Page is used to either create or update an event. It uses the Appleseed.EventsDB() data component to encapsulate all data functionality.

member.name: M:Appleseed.Content.Web.ModulesEventsEdit.OnDelete(System.EventArgs)
member.summary: The DeleteBtn_Click event handler on this Page is used to delete an an event. It uses the Appleseed.EventsDB() data component to encapsulate all data functionality.

member.name: M:Appleseed.Content.Web.ModulesEventsEdit.OnInit(System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Raises OnInitEvent
